markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 13+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Elven Chain](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2801)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=721" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 228 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armor

**Bulk**  varies by armor
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Elven chain is a [chain shirt](/Armor.aspx?ID=6) made of dawnsilver that glitters in even the faintest light. Because it’s constructed with small, supple rings, it has no check penalty.

 Created by elven artisans employing ancient crafting techniques, elven chain is exceptionally quiet. Unlike other chain shirts—even other dawnsilver chain shirts—elven chain doesn’t have the [noisy](/Traits.aspx?ID=205) trait. This suit of armor can be etched with runes like any other dawnsilver chain shirt.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 13"
pfs="Standard"
>
Elven Chain (Standard-Grade)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 228 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 555 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Price** 2,500 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The initial raw materials must include dawnsilver worth at least 3,125 sp.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 20"
pfs="Standard"
>
Elven Chain (High-Grade)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 228 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 555 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Price** 52,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The initial raw materials must include dawnsilver worth at least 26,000 gp.
name: Elven Chain
